title: Trump offers to join potential Russia-Ukraine talks in Turkey
cleaned_sentences: Kyiv/Washington | US President Donald Trump offered on Monday (Tuesday AEST) to join prospective Ukraine-Russia talks in Turkey later this week as European countries pushed to get the Kremlin to accept their demand for a 30-day ceasefire in the war in Ukraine.

Trump spoke a day after Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, in a fresh twist to the stop-start peace talks process, said he would travel to Istanbul where he would be waiting to meet Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin.
